metadata.feature_description: Advanced configuration options including domain name settings and admin tracking preferences with toggle functionality.

steps.action: Navigate to Settings > Connectors and click Connect on Google Analytics 4
steps.actual: Configuration panel opened with Measurement ID field and Track for Administrators checkbox

steps.action: Click on Track for Administrators checkbox to enable it
steps.actual: Checkbox is now checked (blue checkmark visible)

steps.action: With Track for Administrators enabled, click the checkbox to disable it
steps.actual: Checkbox is now unchecked (empty box visible)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Save settings with valid Measurement ID

steps.action: Enter a valid GA4 Measurement ID (G-TEST123456)
steps.expected: Measurement ID is entered in the field
steps.actual: G-TEST123456 entered in Measurement ID field

steps.expected: Settings saved successfully with success message
steps.actual: Success message 'Item successfully saved.' displayed, green checkmark appears next to connector name, Delete Connection button appears

steps.action: Click Save button with empty Measurement ID
steps.actual: Error message 'Tracking Code Cannot Be Empty' displayed

steps.action: Look for Domain Name field in connector settings
steps.expected: Domain Name field should be available in Advanced Settings
steps.actual: Classic Google Analytics connector with Domain Name field is not available in the UI. Only Google Analytics 4 connector is present, which does not include domain name configuration.

issues: The classic Google Analytics connector with Advanced Settings (including Domain Name field) is not visible in the Connectors list. Only Google Analytics 4 connector is available, which has a simplified interface without domain name configuration.

steps.action: Attempt to test empty domain configuration
steps.actual: Domain Name field is not available in Google Analytics 4 connector. The classic Google Analytics connector with this feature is not visible in the UI.

issues: Domain name configuration is not available in Google Analytics 4 connector. This feature exists only in the classic Google Analytics connector which is not present in the UI.

observations: The classic 'Google Analytics' connector (with Advanced Settings dialog containing Domain Name, Admin Tracking Toggle, and Segmentation Rules) exists in the codebase at 'Evoq Content/Connectors/GoogleAnalytics/' but is NOT visible in the Connectors UI list.
Only 'Google Analytics 4' connector is available in the UI, which has a simplified interface with just Measurement ID field and Track for Administrators checkbox.

The code files reviewed (advanced.htm, connector.js, GoogleAnalyticsConnector.cs) describe features for the classic Google Analytics connector that cannot be tested via UI because the connector is not visible.
Google Analytics 4 uses a standard checkbox for 'Track for Administrators' instead of the toggle switch (On/Off) described for the classic connector.
The suggested test scenarios for domain name configuration and segmentation rules are specific to the classic Google Analytics connector which is not accessible via UI.

A warning message in the code indicates: 'Universal Analytics (UA) will sunset on the 1st of July 2023, please config your tracking information to connect to Google Analytics 4 (GA4).' This may explain why the classic GA connector is no longer prominently displayed.
